title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Its all too easy to lose track of time or your possessions when your mind drifts toward other interests and concerns. It might feel as if you must consciously remember that youre moving around in a body today, and not just floating in a cloud of ideas. Set time aside to relieve your mental process by writing your thoughts down or sharing them with a supportive friend. Stay grounded with light exercise and healthy snacks. Double-check your schedule so you continue to meet your mundane commitments as you shuttle through the day. Practicing self-discipline improves your productivity. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
